koii leaderboard: An incentivized game for early adopters
koii desktop node: Our GUI that allows users to run tasks
hello world task: Our task tutorial that explains the basics
memory leakage: Unintentional memory hold by a computer program
nw.js: Toolkit for building desktop apps with web technologies
whitelisting process: Process of approving entities in a security protocol
task staking wallet: A wallet for staking Koii task
distribution wallet: Wallet for distributing rewards or tokens
decentralized commerce: Trade of goods on decentralized platforms
compute task: Specific task run on computing platform
timestamp: Sequence denoting when a certain event occurred
attention contract: Contract that rewards users for real interaction
rewards: Incentives or returns for certain task or activity
database sharing: Process of granting database access to multiple users
k2 node: A specialized node that tracks the Koii blockchain ledger
audit function: Task submissions are audited by task runners
rewards model: Developers will reward task runners with KOII tokens
validators: Desktop or/and K2 Nodes in this context
proofs of real traffic: Koii's attention tracking system rewarding creators
task node: An computer that runs Koii Tasks
mainnet launch: Koii is currently in its test phase, estimated release date is Q4 2023
node operators: People who run Task Nodes or K2 Nodes
compute marketplace: Service connecting excess computing resources with computational power needs
k2 settlement node: Validator nodes that run our blockchain
compute sharing marketplace: Service connecting excess computing resources with computational power needs
desktop node: Program for running compute jobs and earning tokens
gradual consensus: Koii's method for achieving consensus through delayed reward distribution
audit nodes: Nodes that inspect tasks for malicious intent
tasks: Executable code run on the network
slot: Time for each leader to accept transactions and generate a block
epoch: Time duration where a leader schedule is valid
rent: Fee for storing data on the blockchain
rent exemption: Accounts having rent payments for over two years
finnie identity sdk: Wallet SDK compatible with major blockchains and decentralized networks
koii-x ui framework: JavaScript frontend template library for quick application development

koii nodes: Computers that run the Koii Network
proofs of real traffic, aka port: Koii's attention tracking system rewarding creators
finnie: Official wallet of Koii Network for managing digital assets
koii sdk: Software Development Kit for creating Koii Tasks, Nodes, and templates
koii cli: Tool for developers to interact with Koii network via command line
koii faucet: Online KOII token dispenser offering free tokens
koii task: Framework for developers to create tasks quickly
